'''Kyle''', AKA ''"Hums While He Pees"'', is a man divorcing her wife who briefly dated [[Phoebe Buffay|Phoebe]] but then reunited with his wife [[Whitney]]. During their marriage Kyle was emotionally unavailable and didn't "know where everything was in bed" which is a reason they split. He also hums when he pees and at other times.
